alert.note: Alert for Citrus (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 12 at 5:57AM EDT until October 12 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of west central Florida, including the following county, Citrus. * WHEN...Until 730 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 557 AM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Homosassa Springs, Beverly Hills, Crystal River Airport, Black Diamond, Homosassa, Hernando, Crystal Oaks, Pine Ridge, Green Acres, Lecanto, Brent Wood, Citronelle, Citrus Hills, Citrus Springs, Arbor Lakes and River Lakes Manor. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
